goals__remit:
The aim of ESOP is to support optimal treatment for cancer patients. 
 
Objectives: 
1. to develop and promote clinical and oncology pharmacy practice through: 
- education and training 
- safe handling and administration of drugs 
- quality management 
- research and development 
- pharmaceutical care 
2. To make information on knowledge and achievements in cancer treatment and activities available to the public. 
3. To spread the information by publications, professional activities as well as educational lectures an seminars.
